product_name: SLEEVELESS MOCK NECK TOP IN MELT
description: Our new elevated basic, the Sleeveless Mock Neck Top in Melt, comes in black, white, and navy. This simple, elegant, and elevated silhouette provides a fresh update to your tank collection. Pair this with a pair of leggings, a skirt, or use as a layering piece! This top is truly versatile and is oh so buttery soft.

Our best-selling Off Shoulder Sweatshirt in a new silhouette. This tee is the perfect on the go top with our signature off the shoulder look. Great for any occasion and paired with any of our Melt, Takara, and Ribbed workout sets.

The new Zip Long Sleeve Run top in Melt has arrived. This is the perfect on the go zip up for any workout. Features a flattering silhouette, a full zip, stand collar, pockets and thumb holes for an added athletic feature. Pair with the Charcoal Grey Wrap Legging for a complete look perfect for on the go activity!

description: Exclusively ours, mix & match machine-washable linen in the perfect Summer palette. Pair as matching sets, or back to your favorite ribbed styles — from biker shorts to leggings and our customer favorite cami-bra — this will surely land the title of your new daily uniform. description: The Pearl Embellished Sweater is the perfect elevated cable knit sweater featuring cable knit detailing, a crewneck, and pearls scattered across the sweater.

The Carbon38 Sweater Poncho drapes elegantly over your shoulders and is the perfect length to keep you warm and wrapped up during winter. Pair it back with any of our best-selling leggings for the perfect cozy look.

Our signature Corset Tank got an upgrade! This elevated corset with adjustable rhinestone strap detailing is the perfect top for your next get together! Pair it back to our Rhinestone Sweatpants after a workout for a more casual look or dress it up with heels!

product_name: Nike Sportswear Phoenix Cozy Boucle Top- LT Orewood Brn/Medium Ash

description: The 1986 Shirt in Snow White by Norma Kamali is a sleek, elevated, and versatile top ready for any occasion. This top features a front velcro closure, blouson sleeves with split cuffs, and a lightweight slinky jersey fabric.
The Carbon38 Mesh Off Shoulder Top is your new favorite long sleeve. This elegant and sleek off the shoulder top features mesh sleeves with intricate detailing and an overlapping off the shoulder.

The newest fall sweater silhouette is our Raglan Zip Pullover. This features ribbed detailing, long sleeves, and a unique collar zipper for an added detail. Perfect to pair back to any of our leggings.

Our exclusive rhinestone pullover is the perfect pairing back to our rhinestone flare pant. This set is an updated staple to add some shine to your closet. This pullover features a quarter zip fit and a luxe fleece feel.

The Glazy Longsleeve from JetSet is your new go to ski layer to add some flare on the slopes. This longsleeve is made from stretch fabric with a tailored cut, a stand up collar, and a metallic effect to make sure you shine.

The update to our best-selling Button Up shirt as arrived! The Carbon38 Twisted Tunic Shirt features the same elevated silhouette as before with an added twist! This shirt is designed perfectly to take you to and from anywhere.

The Aphrodite Peplum Top from THEO is a unique silhouette that elevates any look. This top pairs perfectly back to our Takara leggings to dress up your activewear.

description: The Carbon38 Long Sleeve Mock Neck Sweetheart Top is the perfect layering piece for fall. Pair with our Tuxedo Leggings or our Mesh Pleated Skirt in black for full looks. This top features a stripe detailing and long sleeves.
The Carbon38 Twist Pullover is a classic addition to your closet. This sweater pairs beautifully with our Silverpine legging. Featuring twist that can be styled both in front and in the back!

description: The newest Carbon38 sweater has launched! Featuring a unique color way stripe and button closure this sophisticated sweater is easy to throw on to elevate  any look. Pair it back to any of our best-selling leggings or dress it up your own way!

description: The Carbon38 Stretch Twill Corset will dress up any legging, or make it a look with our Stretch Twill Stirrup Legging. This Top will take you to the next level whether you wear it alone or layered over our Twisted Tunic Shirt.
Our exclusive button-front cardigan features a v-neck and cable details on the sleeves. It's the perfect amount of cozy and chic.
The wardrobe staple you didn't know you needed. Level up your workout look with this oversized button-up from CARBON38.
The 525 Kira in White is a long sleeve wrapped silhouette with ribbed detailing. It is fitted with a 17 1/2" length.

Our exclusive Run Top in Melt is a great addition as a layering piece for all your workout needs. Perfect for a winter run or just to throw on under your sweatshirt. Featuring one of our core fabrications, Melt, for added comfort!

This exclusive Embroidered Crew Sweatshirt features our custom embroidered octopus in the right upper corner. This is a perfect addition to your closet. Pair back with our White Octopus Sneakers for a full outfit!

The Grayling top from Madeleine Thompson is their most popular shaped round neck jumper. This is a great addition to your wardrobe featuring a crew neck, long sleeves and the zig zag detailing. Pair it back with the Wilson Pants for a full look.

Whether you are on the slopes or in a cozy cabin, the Carbon38 Buffalo Plaid Long Sleeve is the perfect base layer. Match back to the Printed Legging in Buffalo Plaid for a full base layer set that will keep you warm all winter.

description: Fitted mock-neck full zip jacket from Michi features mesh cutout details and a thumbhole at the sleeve.

product_name: Long Sleeve Wrap Top in Melt

description: The Sheer Long Sleeve Leotard features a classic minimal design with beautiful geometric sheer detailing on the front with a key hole back and sheer sleeves. For a full look, pair back to our Sheer Stirrup Legging in Black or layer under our Mesh Pleated Skirt.

The perfect cardigan for any occasion. Our new Pearl Cardigan Sweater can easily elevate any workout set as well as dress up any post-workout outfit. Featuring a soft hand feel with pearl detailing along the seams.
The Seamed Tank in Melt is the perfect elegant and elevated tank for any occasion. This top features contrast shine silhouette and adjustable strap detailing.
The Metallic Mesh Tee in black provides the perfect amount of sparkle to your workout wear. This shirt is an easy layering piece for any outfit. Perfectly paired with our Black Takara Set.

Our Tuxedo Mock Neck Top is the new go to for a dressed up look. This elevated and sleek design allows you flexibility to dress it up and dress it down. Featuring a double layer fully lined melt body with a Takara shine neckband..  Pair it with our Mesh Pleated Skirt for a dressier look or with the Tuxedo legging for a head to toe moment.

The Puff Sleeve Full Zip is the newest trend! This unique and spectacular top will definitely be a show stopper layering piece. The sweet lavender contrast stitching offers an elevated and elegant silhouette. Pair this back to our Fleece Back Seam Legging in White and Sweet Lavender for a full look.

The Fleece Back Half Zip Top is perfect for any winter workout. This will keep you warm in the snow and ready for any workout. With our classic navy coloring and new blue atoll and pink detailing, this half zip is the perfect addition to any cold weather athlete!
